com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl

Class SqliteCriteria<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl.SqliteCriteria<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Criteria<T>

    public class SqliteCriteria<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Criteria<T>

    Implementation of Criteria for SQLite queries.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 02/17/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Constructor Detail

      • SqliteCriteria

        public SqliteCriteria(InfinitumOrmContext context,
              java.lang.Class<T> entityClass,
              SqliteModelFactory modelFactory,
              SqlBuilder sqlBuilder,
              SqliteMapper mapper)
               throws InfinitumRuntimeException
        Constructs a new SqliteCriteria.
        Parameters:
        context - the InfinitumOrmContext this SqliteCriteria is scoped to
        entityClass - the Class to create SqliteCriteria for
        sqlBuilder - SqlBuilder for generating SQL statements
        mapper - the SqliteMapper to use for Object mapping
        Throws:
        InfinitumRuntimeException - if entityClass is transient
